Package gerberFileReader

Class StepAndRepeatBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • gerberFileReader.GraphicsStream
      • gerberFileReader.Aperture
        • gerberFileReader.Block
          • gerberFileReader.StepAndRepeatBlock
  • public class StepAndRepeatBlock
extends Block
    A class to hold a Gerber Step and Repeat Block
    See Also:
    Section 4.12 of the Gerber Layer Format Specification

    • Method Detail

      • getCountX

        public int getCountX()
        Returns:
        the number of repeats in the X direction

      • getCountY

        public int getCountY()
        Returns:
        the number of repeats in the Y direction

      • getStepX

        public double getStepX()
        Returns:
        the distance to step in the X direction for each repeat

      • getStepY

        public double getStepY()
        Returns:
        the distance to step in the Y direction for each repeat

      • getGraphicStream

        public GraphicsStream getGraphicStream()
        Replicates and steps the block defined for this StepAndRepeatBlock to form the array of GraphicalObjects. Per the Gerber specification, the block is replicated in the Y direction first and then in the X direction.
        Returns:
        the GraphicsStream produced by the this StepAndRepeatBlock
